scene_description_enriched: A group of figures, including the Virgin Mary in blue and a man in a brown robe kneeling, are depicted in prayer. They are looking upwards towards a dove radiating golden light, symbolizing the Holy Spirit. Behind them, a stone structure with inscribed text is visible, suggesting a sacred or significant location. A table with a book displaying musical notation is present in the foreground. The scene is framed by an arched border, typical of manuscript illumination.
